column8: en los cuales salvo muchas vidas. en su entorno familiar procreo 4 hijos

column15: of orlando passed away on june 12
column17: ny on 10/08/1955. he was a police officer of san juan
column19: using with great honor plate #032. during his years of labor he was very dedicated to his work as a police officer in which he saved many lives. in family he had 4 children

column25: friend and colleague. we'll always carry you in our hearts. upcoming events. viewingjun 17. 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm a community funeral home & sunset cremations910 w. michigan st. orlando
